metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5021 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Form API in Drupal 6.x before 6.32 and possibly 7.x before 7.29 allows remote authenticated users with the "administer taxonomy" permission to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via an option group label.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5021` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

drupal7 - 7.32-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7.32-1').
